title: New: Panda Bear – The Preakness
body:
![](http://www.mbvmusic.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/07/atlas-sound-bradford.jpg "PB")Dropped earlier today, The Preakness is Panda Bear’s contribution to the Keep cassette, made available at [midnight today](http://keepcompany.tumblr.com/tagged/Keep_Animal_Collective). Animal Collective have designed a pair of trainers to be released alongside a cassette featuring tracks from various band members, with all profits going to Socorro Island Conservation Fund. Continuing very much in a similar vein to upcoming record Tom Boy; it’s a glorious lo-fi infused track, merging elegant vocals and a formulaic yet captivating beat. Listen to it below.

[Panda Bear – “The Preakness”](http://soundcloud.com/znaki-fm/panda-bear-the-preakness) by [znaki.fm](http://soundcloud.com/znaki-fm)
